text: Ra jaba uniharumathi kunai kasta hunthyo taba yasto bhanthe, â€˜â€˜he musa! Hamro nimti aphno palanakartasita tyasa pratijnako adharama prarthana garnus juna usale tapa'insita gareko cha, yadi tapa'ile hamila'i yasa sajayabata mukta gara'idinu huncha bhane hamile avasya nai tapa'ile bhane bamojima imana lya'unechaum ra isra'ilaka santanala'i (chutakara di'era) tapa'iko sathama jana dinechaum
